name: Telegram Voice Chat Bot
description: Advanced Telegram voice chat bot with PyTgCalls 2.2.5, enhanced audio processing, and 600% volume boost

API_ID.description: Your Telegram API ID (get from https://my.telegram.org)

API_HASH.description: Your Telegram API Hash (get from https://my.telegram.org)

OWNER_IDS.description: Comma-separated list of authorized Telegram User IDs (get from @userinfobot)

MAX_ACCOUNTS.description: Maximum number of accounts to manage

scripts.postdeploy: echo 'Deployment successful! Start your bot by messaging it on Telegram.'
